animeDescription: In their new adventure, Yuuna and Stitch move from their small island Izayoi to the Okinawa main island where Yuuna is supposed to visit a school. A new cast of friends awaits them there as well as a new crisis approaching from space.  (Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Disney Stitch: Best Friends Forever', 'Stitch!: Itazura Alien no Daibouken', 'Stitch!: Itazura Alien no Daibouken - Uchuu Ichi no Oniichan', 'Stitch to Suna no Wakusei', 'Stitch!: Zutto Saikou no Tomodachi Special']
